Dialogs.Text: Message: Hello Cipher: I'm a longtime follower of yours and never had the opportunity to send you something before.
Message: I found your last video to be one of your best works yet, so i'm excited to see what you can do with this information.
Message: You see, remember 3 years ago? Your video about the history and closure 'RoomsChat.com'?
Message: I recently discovered an active abandoned server of the chat, and since you were really interested in the subject, i wanted to give you the link to the place so you can cover it for a video!
Message: It's rare to see a followup of such an old video, but i think this time is worth it! Also, i will be somewhere in the chat if you need a guide to the place.
Message: I can show you the most interesting places to cover, and since the place is a bit glitchy, it would also be a good idea for you to find me.
Message: Attached to this message is the link to the server. See you there!
>Cipher decides to click the link to the server
